channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report X-2024020901
item.description:
Report X-2024020901

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-03
  • City: SOUTH BURLINGTON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called when it was discovered in a trailer that this hazmat had a small hole, from which bubbling could be seen from a small hole, indicating a leak. It was contained safely using PPE and a Hazmat bin, and was brought to the Hazmat Area. DescribePack: Unsure how it came to be damaged but package seems to have had some sort of impact with a sharp object at the top of the jerrican. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Contained safely using PPE and a Hazmat bin, and was brought to the Hazmat Area.
